title: The Mothers (Die Mütter) from War (Krieg)

dimensions: composition (irreg.): 13 1/2 x 15 3/4" (34.3 x 40 cm); sheet (irreg.): 18 9/16 x 26 1/8" (47.2 x 66.4 cm)
